alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 20 at 1:42PM PST until January 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM FRIDAY TO 6 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. Gusts to 75 mph expected on the coastal slopes of the San Bernardino mountains. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the High Wind Warning, from 3 PM Friday to 6 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northeast winds will continue for Saturday night into Sunday, but are not expected to be as strong as the winds on Saturday.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
